verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: he will meet North Korean leader Kim Jong Un on June 12 in Singapore , locking in a historic summit between the two leaders amid their confrontation over Pyongyang ’s nuclear weapons program] .

President Donald Trump said he [V: will] meet North Korean leader Kim Jong Un on June 12 in Singapore , locking in a historic summit between the two leaders amid their confrontation over Pyongyang ’s nuclear weapons program .

President Donald Trump said [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: meet] [ARG1: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-TMP: on June 12] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] , [ARGM-ADV: locking in a historic summit between the two leaders amid their confrontation over Pyongyang ’s nuclear weapons program] .

President Donald Trump said [ARG0: he] will meet North Korean leader Kim Jong Un on June 12 in Singapore , [V: locking] in [ARG1: a historic summit between the two leaders amid their confrontation over Pyongyang ’s nuclear weapons program] .
